structure.unit: ARTICLE II. RESTRICTION ON CERTAIN FISHING NETS

text.section:
Sec. 14A-14. Exemption for certain institutions.
The provisions of of this article shall not apply to the use of any gill net by an eleemosynary corporation or governmental entity when utilized for educational or research activities in Dade County waters and which eleemosynary corporation or governmental entity has obtained a permit from the Department of Environmental Resources Management of Metropolitan Dade County. Whenever any person is aggrieved by the decision of the Department of Environmental Resources Management with respect to the granting or denial of such a permit, he may appeal the decision to the Environmental Quality Control Board pursuant to the procedures contained in of the Code. Any person aggrieved by any decision of the Environmental Quality Control Board on such an appeal may apply to the appropriate court of Dade County for review thereof in accordance with applicable court rules.
